title: No Capsule From Level Up
body: Hi! I was playing league yesterday and I leveled up from 40 to 41 but never got my champion capsule. I'm pretty sure I got a mastery token during that game I leveled up. Might that have to do with anything? Anyways I hope someone can help me with this. Thanks!

replies.body:
We've been seeing this weird issue a lot lately, but luckily it's easy enough to track down and correct. Double check your loot now fam 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I didn't receive a capsule when I leveled from 31 to 32. I've sent in tickets twice, and each time within 24 hours someone at Riot deletes my ticket without responding to me. Not sure what's up with that bullshyt and complete lack of customer service.
a lot of people have the same problem send in a ticket
